definition: to vow before one's troops
oath/vow/to swear/to pledge
surname Shi

sentences.english: Over 200 youth members join the kick-off ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 超過二百名青年會員進行誓師儀式。

sentences.english: The rulers of Xia Dynasty administer their oaths in the army for they want their people to be mentally prepared.
sentences.chinese: 夏啓在軍中誓師，是爲了使軍隊事先有思想準備。

sentences.english: Puma son also successfully from the hand of the director to the pledging conference defend the deployment diagram.
sentences.chinese: 彪子也成功的從導演手中拿到了誓師大會保衛部署圖。

sentences.english: The Democrats held a pep rally on Capitol Hill yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 民主黨昨天在國會山召開了競選誓師大會。

sentences.english: The officiating guests also officiated the Pledge Ceremony of the exchange tour.
sentences.chinese: 主禮嘉賓在典禮中同時主持北京交流團的誓師儀式。
